originalText.text: Had the joy of getting a manicure at Nails posh studio, my experience was amazing, the relaxed ambiance of the salon had me on chill mode.  The Technician Nelsi was very professional as well as courteous, definitely will be back and I definitely highly recommend a prompt visit

text.text: Had the joy of getting a manicure at Nails posh studio, my experience was amazing, the relaxed ambiance of the salon had me on chill mode.  The Technician Nelsi was very professional as well as courteous, definitely will be back and I definitely highly recommend a prompt visit

originalText.text: This has to be the WORST nail experience I’ve ever had. As a new client at Nail Posh Studio I had hoped for a skilled professional who could provide a polished and well-executed service. Sadly, this was not the case. The technician was nice, but she was rough on my nails, causing painful cuts. The nail tips were glued in an outward angle, and I had asked her to fix them but it was evident the young girl lacked experience. After almost two hours of torture, I paid for the service, but won't be returning again. Here is a picture of my nail 3 months later! That’s how long I had to wait for my nail to regrow and that’s why I’m writing this review.

text.text: This has to be the WORST nail experience I’ve ever had. As a new client at Nail Posh Studio I had hoped for a skilled professional who could provide a polished and well-executed service. Sadly, this was not the case. The technician was nice, but she was rough on my nails, causing painful cuts. The nail tips were glued in an outward angle, and I had asked her to fix them but it was evident the young girl lacked experience. After almost two hours of torture, I paid for the service, but won't be returning again. Here is a picture of my nail 3 months later! That’s how long I had to wait for my nail to regrow and that’s why I’m writing this review.

originalText.text: Charming nail place, a little bit older  (no pedicure chairs here)with an interesting doll collection on display. Cleanliness overall 4/5 and all the instruments were sanitized. The best thing  by far was the service. My esthetician took her time and focused on the details- I got a regular manicure and pedicure which took about an hour and 15 minutes. Really appreciated all the clear care she put into my nails. I would definitely return if I needed a solid manicure in the heights again.

originalText.text: Let me start with ty lissi the girl who did my feet.. because of you i gave this place 3 stars.. pic to follow ... you were amazing!! I got to this place 9:45 am had an appt which i made on instagram one for feet one for hands 10 and 11.. lissi told me if her client doesn’t come she will take me lady showed up late  had to wait 1 1/2 later my turn thank god.. the girl for my appt didn’t show, how would i know just made an appt first time here. The person who did show up for hands said her schedule was busy and couldn’t she tried to get someone to do other hands but seems like no success.. told me to do my feet someone is coming.1 o clock i am done, no one  showed and noone even tried to apologize.. i came willing to try this place i heard such great things but as customers kept coming in complaining im not sure why its such bad customer service.. its like every dog for themselves... noone cared.. moving on place is nice.,.. needs some work maybe workers they shouldn’t be talking about the boss while clients are in the salon..

originalText.text: Best manicure ever had …also the owner it’s really funny and attractive woman who knows very well how to speak with customers and entertain them …ill definitely be back
